name: Bally Bully (chapter 1)
description:
Welcome to bally bully  ! in this market your child will never be afraid of the dark again  don't forget the dark and your friends , Bally bully is a horror game what happens in a market give up go find you the secret behind ..... the darkness is your friend

1989 mr spherkaw creates the market bally bully

and creates it so that children are no longer afraid 

of the dark this and was a very bad thing for him and his family

 

prepared you explored playing with monsters and 

discovering the horrible story of bally bully
